item.title: I tested LG G5 OLED TV’s free Dolby Vision upgrade — and the brightness boost is very real
item.description: LG's latest firmware update seemingly brightens most of its Dolby Vision picture modes on its OLED TVs, so I decided to test it out.

item.title: Skip Samsung’s 2026 TVs — these 7 top-rated models are heavily discounted right now

item.title: Xiaomi 15T Pro ou OnePlus 15R : nos coups de cœur 8/10 sont en promo, mais lequel choisir ?
item.description: Le Xiaomi 15T Pro et le OnePlus 15R sont deux smartphones notés 8/10 par Frandroid et sont actuellement en promotion. Ils offrent d’excellentes prestations à prix réduit. Reste une question essentielle : lequel est fait pour vous ?

item.title: Returning stolen artifacts becomes a thrilling heist in Relooted
item.description: Colonialism is not merely about occupying nations. It's a project of mass violence, part of which involves total erasure and the widespread theft of some of the most culturally significant artifacts in the world. Even today, colonizing nations proudly display stolen artifacts, acting as peacocking robbers under the guise of tourism. See, for example, the […]...

item.title: Anker’s USB-C cable that lets you charge two gadgets at once is 20 percent off
item.description: Monday, February 16th, is Presidents Day, and there are plenty of good deals happening on tech in the run-up to the holiday. Even if you don’t snag any huge upgrades, though, you likely already own multiple gadgets that you need to recharge each and every day. It would sure be nice to be able to […]

item.title: GTA 6 arrives in the era of podcasting, and I’m betting it’ll absolutely parody wellness bros, true crime, and Reddit relationship confessions
item.description: GTA 6 will absolutely have podcasts, at least that's what I'm betting on. Here's the five shows I think the game will parody.

item.title: Bias is eating your AI budget
item.description: The commercial risks of poorly governed automation are now impossible for business leaders to ignore.

item.title: Homeland Security has reportedly sent out hundreds of subpoenas to identify ICE critics online
item.description: The Department of Homeland Security (DHS) has reportedly been asking tech companies for information on accounts posting anti-ICE sentiments. According to The New York Times, DHS has sent hundreds of administrative subpoenas to Google, Reddit, Discord and Meta over the past few months. Homeland Security asked the companies for names, email addresses, telephone numbers and any other identifying detail for accounts that have criticized the US Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency or have reported the location of its agents. Google, Meta and Reddit have complied with some of the requestsAdmi...

item.description: All the ways to watch Scotland vs England live streams online – including for FREE – for the Calcutta Cup clash at Murrayfield in the 2026 Six Nations.

item.title: Ring’s Flock breakup doesn’t fix its real problem
item.description: The most striking thing about Ring's statement that it had parted ways with Flock Safety is what the home security company didn't say. There was no mention of the public backlash around ties to ICE, or any promise to address users' concerns about the company's relationships with law enforcement. In an increasingly authoritarian political climate, […]...

item.title: A ‘desk yoga’ teacher recommends 3 beginner-friendly exercises for better posture and to undo the damage of gaming and office work
item.description: Three 'movement snacks' you can do at your desk to undo the damage of gaming and office work

item.title: How to customize your iPhone home screen with iOS 26
item.description: Apple has steadily expanded home screen customization on the iPhone over the past few years, and iOS 26 continues that trend with more visual control over app icons. Building on the changes introduced in iOS 18, the latest update lets you resize icons, remove app labels, apply system-wide color tints and make icons translucent using Apple’s new Liquid Glass design language.Most of these options live in one place: the Customize menu, which appears after entering edit mode on the home screen. While iOS still doesn’t allow total freeform icon placement or third-party icon packs without shortcuts,...

item.title: The problem with Emerald Fennells "Wuthering Heights" is audience expectations.
item.description: Months before the film’s release, there were signals that this wouldn't be the adaptation of Emily Brontë’s classic fans were expecting.
